Package ohos.media.common

Class Source

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.Source

  • public class Source
extends Object
    Describes the media data source, which can be a URI or file descriptor.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Source.AudioSource
      Describes the audio source.
      static class  Source.VideoSource
      Describes the video source, including the camera and surface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int AUDIO_SOURCE_INIT
      Indicates the default audio source.
      static int VIDEO_SOURCE_INIT
      Indicates the default video source.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Source​()
      Default constructor used to create a Source instance.
      Source​(FileDescriptor fd)
      A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a file descriptor.
      Source​(FileDescriptor fd, long offset, long len)
      A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a file descriptor, start offset, and source data length.
      Source​(String uri)
      A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a specified URI.
      Source​(String uri, Map<String,String> header)
      A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a specified URI and headers.

      • Source

        public Source​(String uri)

        Since:

      • Source

        public Source​(String uri,
              Map<String,String> header)
        A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a specified URI and headers. This is usually used for creating a source through HTTP or HTTPS files.
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the media source URI.
        header - Indicates data headers.
        Since:
        1

      • Source

        public Source​(FileDescriptor fd)
        A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a file descriptor. This is usually used for creating a source through local files.
        Parameters:
        fd - Indicates the file descriptor.
        Since:
        1

      • Source

        public Source​(FileDescriptor fd,
              long offset,
              long len)
        A constructor used to create a Source instance based on a file descriptor, start offset, and source data length.
        Parameters:
        fd - Indicates the file descriptor.
        offset - Indicates the start offset.
        len - Indicates the source data length.
        Since:
        1
